net.bytebuddy.implementation.auxiliary

类 TypeProxy.SilentConstruction.Appender

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.implementation.auxiliary.TypeProxy.SilentConstruction.Appender
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ByteCodeAppender
    封闭类:
    TypeProxy.SilentConstruction

    protected static class TypeProxy.SilentConstruction.Appender
extends Object
implements ByteCodeAppender
    The appender for implementing a TypeProxy.SilentConstruction.

    • 方法详细资料

      • apply

        public ByteCodeAppender.Size apply(MethodVisitor methodVisitor,
                                   Implementation.Context implementationContext,
                                   MethodDescription instrumentedMethod)
        从接口复制的说明: ByteCodeAppender
        Applies this byte code appender to a type creation process.
        指定者:
        apply 在接口中 ByteCodeAppender
        参数:
        methodVisitor - The method visitor to which the byte code appender writes its code to.
        implementationContext - The implementation context of the current type creation process.
        instrumentedMethod - The method that is the target of the instrumentation.
        返回:
        The required size for the applied byte code to run.
